page.title: 04Peace Camps and Protests
page.content:
Next to the Upper Heyford Air Base has been set up a camp of squatters who are protesting at having American Nuclear forces stationed there. They are not local people but live in a collection of caravans, tents and huts. They are mainly unemployed. The local council has tried to move them but without success. Local publicans refuse to serve them.
From time to time the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament has protest marches to the base.Sometimes they block the road or try to get into the base and cut the perimeter fence. The Police often arrest large numbers of protesters and some disruption of their daily lives is caused to local people.
